1.16.5.skiing-1.16.5-1.1.0:
Additions:
- ski rack: place down your skis and ski sticks in the new ski rack
- a new config to change some values for skis and snow layering
 - snow layering mechanic: snow layers will be placed when it snows / removed when it stops snowing

Changes:
- new skis item pose
 - lowercased the of the skis item nbt
-small tweaks and fixes
1.16.5.skiing-1.16.5-1.2.0:
Additions:
- more ski racks: acacia, birch, crimson, dark oak, jungle, oak, spruce, warped
- snowboard. It's a skiing mod, but snowboards are cool, too, aren't they?

removed old stuff, fixed small issues
1.16.5.skiing-1.16.5-1.3.0:
Additions:
- config to disable/enable generation of the alps biome
Changes:
- merchants workstation to ski racks (all types)
Fixed:
- dropped skis item instead if snowboard item
- placing block on client side when opening skiing rack container with a block/ski sticks work for snowboards
